short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An Epic Shooter To Test Ones Vigor

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Heavy Simulator is an original top down shooter that places the player in an action packed arena with AAA graphics and paramount gameplay. The player must survive and shoot endless on coming waves of enemies in the pursuit of a new high score. 

Constrols:
     WASD/Arrow Keys - movement
     Mouse - turn
     (Below controls can be changed in the settings menu.)
     Space - shoot
     E - enter store
     X - exit store


Source Code: https://github.com/AssMonke/Heavy

Update v0.5.0:
     1. Settings menu added - 
          a. Controls for entering/exiting the store and shooting can now be changed (click the key 
          button then when the --- appears click the new key on your keyboard).
          b. The maximum amount of blood effects can be changed or set to 0 to completely 
          remove blood.
     2. When upgrading to pyro, the player is now invincible, and afterwards the price quadruples 
     instead of doubling.
     3. The player now has 2 lives rather than 3. 
     4. Blood textures are now smaller.
     5. Arrow keys can now be used to move as well as WASD.

Update v0.4.1:
     1. Upgrade system added - press E at the store in the middle of the arena then X to exit
          a. pyro - lasts for 10 seconds at an increasing cost; buffs the player
     2. health system added - the player now can get hit 3 times before the game ends
